title: syscall: backport ppc64/ppc64le epoll_event struct fix to Go 1.6.2?
body:
@laboger requests we backport the fix to #15135 (44f80f6d4925ae59b519ced3a626170099258904, https://golang.org/cl/21582) for Go 1.6.2.

This bug is to consider that.

It only affects ppc64, and makes Docker run there.

/cc @rsc @adg @ianlancetaylor
